perturbation.original_text: COMWARE TECHNICAL SERVICES OF 17922 SKY PARK CIRCLE, SUITE E, IRVINE, CALIFORNIA 92614-6414  (COMWARE) certifies that the Products furnished under this agreement by INTERNATIONAL TEST SYSTEMS, INC. OF 4703 SHAVANO OAK, SUITE 102, SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS 78249 (ITS) will be incorporated by COMWARE as a part of COMWARE'S systems which  COMWARE  sells or leases to  unaffiliated  third  parties in the  regular course of  COMWARE'S  business  and that  COMWARE'S  own  contribution  to these systems reflect a verifiable value added.  COMWARE also represents that it is an experienced  user of  computer  equipment  and  software  sufficiently  like the Products,  as  defined  below,  and  that it needs  only  minor  support  in the incorporation of the Products into its lines of business.
perturbation.changed_text: COMWARE TECHNICAL SERVICES OF 17922 SKY PARK CIRCLE, SUITE E, IRVINE, CALIFORNIA 92614-6414  (COMWARE) certifies that the Items furnished under this agreement by INTERNATIONAL TEST SYSTEMS, INC. OF 4703 SHAVANO OAK, SUITE 102, SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS 78249 (ITS) will be incorporated by COMWARE as a part of COMWARE'S systems which  COMWARE  sells or leases to  unaffiliated  third  parties in the  regular course of  COMWARE'S  business  and that  COMWARE'S  own  contribution  to these systems reflect a verifiable value added.  COMWARE also represents that it is an experienced  user of  computer  equipment  and  software  sufficiently  like the Commodities,  as  defined  below,  and  that it needs  only  minor  support  in the incorporation of the Merchandise into its lines of business.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Products', 'Items', 'Commodities', and 'Merchandise' are used interchangeably without clear definition. This creates confusion about what exactly COMWARE is incorporating into its systems and what is covered under the agreement, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: o Use best efforts to market and sell the Products to customers.      o Provide marketing feedback to ITS.      o Train customers on and demonstrate ITS products.      o COMWARE reserves the right to develop and sell value-added services that        support the sales of ITS systems.      o COMWARE reserves the right to develop their own marketing materials,        brochures, and advertisements for ITS' products at no cost to ITS.      o Communicate with and respond to ITS AND ITS inquires.      o Assist ITS in customer feedback.
perturbation.changed_text: o Use reasonable efforts to market and sell the Deliverables to clients.      o Provide promotional feedback to ITS.      o Educate patrons on and exhibit ITS deliverables.      o COMWARE reserves the right to develop and sell value-added services that        support the sales of ITS systems.      o COMWARE reserves the right to develop their own marketing materials,        brochures, and advertisements for ITS' products at no cost to ITS.      o Communicate with and respond to ITS AND ITS inquires.      o Assist ITS in customer feedback.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Products', 'customers', 'marketing feedback', and 'Train customers' have been replaced with 'Deliverables', 'clients', 'promotional feedback', and 'Educate patrons,' respectively. This introduces inconsistency in terminology, potentially leading to disputes over the exact scope of COMWARE's marketing obligations and the target audience.

perturbation.original_text: ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or      workmanship  for 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment      purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be      repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to      COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the      cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority      shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
perturbation.changed_text: ITS  Deliverables  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or      workmanship  for 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Hardware      purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be      repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to      COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  hardware  to ITS. ITS will bear the      cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority      shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Products' is replaced with 'Deliverables' and 'equipment' is changed to 'hardware'. This change creates ambiguity because the contract already referred to products, which are now deliverables, and the change from equipment to hardware narrows the scope of what is covered by the warranty. This could lead to disputes over what constitutes a 'deliverable' or 'hardware' and whether certain defective items are covered under the warranty.
